exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: induction ns; intros; simpl in *. - break_match; intuition. - break_match; intuition. + unfold remove_all in *. break_if; simpl in *; intuition. find_inversion. auto using Permutation_refl with *. + unfold remove_all in *. break_if. * simpl. find_apply_lem_hyp Permutation_in. specialize (H0 a). contradict H0. rewrite filter_rel_in. right. eauto. eapply remove_all_Permutation; eauto. * simpl. rewrite IHns; auto using Permutation_sym with *. repeat find_reverse_rewrite. f_equal. clear IHns. apply Permutation_map. eapply Permutation_map_2. eapply Permutation_sym. eapply Permutation_map. eapply Permutation_sym. eapply remove_all_Permutation; eauto.
